fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.meter

Class ElectricMeterUnitTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.meter.ElectricMeterUnitTester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI

    public class ElectricMeterUnitTester
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class ElectricMeterUnitTester performs unit tests for the electric meter component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0

    Created on : 2023-09-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

        public static void testGetTension(fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent tester,
                                  ElectricMeterOutboundPort emop,
                                  fr.sorbonne_u.components.utils.tests.TestsStatistics statistics)
        test getting the tension of the electric meter.

        Gherkin specification

         Feature: Getting the tension of the electric meter
   Scenario: getting the tension
     Given the electric meter has just been initialised
     When I get the tension of the electric meter
     Then the tension is the one defined by the electric meter

        Contract

         pre     tester != null
 pre     emop != null
 pre     statistics != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        tester - tester component.
        emop - outbound port to be used to call the tested methods.
        statistics - collector of tests statistics.
